description:
This Qt variant for Whatsapp web looks great with KDE Plasma. Got it up and running within 2 minutes. No hassles at all. It also has a dark mode but for some reason it didn't get activated automatically. I had to change it manually. 
4/5 only because the app doesn't use Kde plasma notifications API. it uses classic Qt dialogues instead. That is the only missing feature. I hope the dev implements that as well. Great work.
its the best app of all, like the native win/mac os app. all features work, thanks for the great work!
